name: My Internet Corporation ('mi')
tag_list: archive, archiving, family, cloud, storage, e-beneficiary, time-line, diary, milestones, yearbook, private, privacy, sharing, photos, videos, social-media
overview:
mi Corp has created the web, iPhone & iPad storage application mi Lifemap (http://www.miLifemap.com).

mi Lifemap is a private storage application for a family’s most meaningful memories. Privately map your photos, videos, diary & social networking activities onto an intuitive & interactive timeline allowing you to securely organize, archive, & share a curated story of your life with only those who want to see it.

mi Lifemap is a uniquely personalized life platform built for families to easily recall, rediscover and reflect upon a lifetime of captivating memories from one private account for life. Members can organize their best & most important memories & life events into Milestones (wedding, honeymoon, baby births, etc.) & create yearbooks of their favorite memories & recurring events from each & every year (holidays, birthdays, anniversaries, vacations, favs, etc). Add depth to these moments through private diary entries as well as social commentary through the integration and backup of Twitter, Facebook, Foursquare & Flikr.

A Lifemap is your life story & it can be left to an eBeneficiary in your family posthumously. Like a 21st Century digital attic box, mi Lifemap allows our members to pass down their account to future generations in their family to cherish forever.
